remarks: If a point is moved by exactly one of two permutations, then it will be moved by their composite.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.)
statement: f1omvdco3 $p |- ( ( F : A -1-1-onto-> A /\ G : A -1-1-onto-> A /\ ( X e. dom ( F \ _I ) \/_ X e. dom ( G \ _I ) ) ) -> X e. dom ( ( F o. G ) \ _I ) ) $.
